snippet: In a troubling sign for sales to Europe, Germany’s economy shrank more than expected late last year, and the slowdown deepened the region’s ongoing recession
abstract: Stocks are steady as renewed worries about Europe overshadow encouraging report on jobs in the United States.
lead_paragraph: In a troubling sign for sales to Europe, Germany’s economy shrank more than expected late last year, and the slowdown deepened the region’s ongoing recession

headline.main: Shares Are Steady Despite New Worries About Europe
headline.print_headline: Shares Are Steady Despite New Worries About Europe
